title: Wrong Esports timings
body:
It says today 8am when it's actually tomorrow. I think all timings below are a day ahead. Under Esports > overview. The schedule tab looks to be right though.

http://imgur.com/a/tAquW

replies.body: Checked. The timing is right on the [schedule] page but wrong on the [overview]. But tomorrow it will be alright, literately. lol
Yep. I guess the client assumed it was the 14th.
